Name: borax production, anhydrous, powder | borax, anhydrous, powder | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production out of sodium borates by melting technology, using a rotary kiln and a subsequent fusion furnace. The overall process yield is assumed as 98%. Input amount bases on stoechiometric calculations. The energy consumption is estimated based on filament glass production in Europe.
